subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The substitute Yossi Benayoun scored during injury time, leading Liverpool to a 1-0 victory at Fulham and tightening the pressure on the defending champion Manchester United in the title race. Liverpool moved 2 points ahead in the Premier League, but United has two games in hand and hosts Aston Villa on Sunday. Liverpool routed United and Villa before the two-week international break.
